data.name: Sidestep Legends
data.detailed_description:
Practise your sidestep skills as you dodge spells coming at you from all directions. Level up and choose from a variety of upgrades and new abilities to increase your chances of survival in this moba inspired rogue-lite. Unlock new characters and explore different skill combinations each round.

Sidestep your way through the storm of abilities thrown at you


Or use your own abilities to block and dodge


Features:
  • Quick 20 minutes rounds
  • Growing roster of characters to unlock each with its own stats and unique trait
  • Large pool of active abilities and passive upgrades to choose from during gameplay
  • Permanent upgrades that makes you stronger after each run
